entry:
Hi! Welcome to my personal website. I'm a student at Cornell University. I'm pretty open to learn about anything. In fact, I dream of one day being able to do everything: from knitting to repairing drywall, from rigging mundane household items with electronics to cooking a 5 star meal (...maybe more like 3), and from maintaining a home garden to catching trout at the lake. This way, I will get to experience a little bit of everyone's world.
Most imporantly, I try to make my biggest goal to make the world a better place than the one I was born into. I think that's what makes me happy. Here's a little bit more on who I am:
